document.full_text: scores of indonesian men rallied on friday to publicly vow their readiness to sacrifice their lives to avenge the death of osama bin laden, in a sign of the al qaeda leader's popularity among hard-core islamists in the most populous muslim country.
document.title: scores of indonesian youths vow to avenge bin laden's death
lines_and_colors: scores of indonesian men rallied on friday to publicly vow their readiness to sacrifice their lives to avenge the death of osama bin laden, in a sign of the al qaeda leader's popularity among hard-core islamists in the most populous muslim country.
